description: This instrumentation enables producer and consumer messaging spans for Spring Integration.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.spring-integration.producer.enabled
configurations.description: Create producer spans when messages are sent to an output channel. Enable when you're using a messaging library that doesn't have its own instrumentation for generating producer spans. Note that the detection of output channels only works for Spring Cloud Stream `DirectWithAttributesChannel`.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.spring-integration.global-channel-interceptor-patterns
configurations.description: An array of Spring channel name patterns that will be intercepted.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.messaging.experimental.capture-headers
configurations.description: Allows configuring headers to capture as span attributes.
